Text:
Can someone help me, i'm want to know which qualities are what? there are so many, i dont know which one to pick. I'm looking for a DVD-R on TPB that is identical to a retail bought dvd movie ( i know it should exist, it was like that last time i burnt movies in 2008) 

TS2DVD
HDRip2DVD
HDCAM2DVD

There are so many, but which ones are the "REAL" ones? with exact copies of retail dvd's

@stridsvagnen91

TS2DVD, HDRip2DVD, HDCAM2DVD
Alsi there are WD2DVD, WR2DVD, 720p2DVD
1080pDVD.

First u must start read the provided info where source is written. 
Second Never think that a DVDR is Retail Simply because DVDR is a short word of DVD-Recordable.

http://www.webopedia.com/DidYouKnow/Hardware_Software/DVDFormatsExplained.asp
